page.title: 07Gourdon Fish Van Driver
page.content: At 7.00am Hector Ingram gets up to prepare to go out in his van selling fish. The first thing he does is pack the fish into the van. On the van he sells mostly{haddock}and in the summer he sells a lot of{herring.}He also sells cooking fat and fishdressing.On Tuesday and Wednesday he travels to Fife and on Thursday and Friday he travels to Perthshire. On average he travels 150 miles each day. Even during the most inclement weather Mr. Ingram still goes out. Mr. Ingram started this job because he got a chance of a van and he has been doing this job for 18 years. The thing he likes best about his job is the travelling. Mr. Ingram gets back about 7.00pm and when he returns he washes the trays and van.
